languages.text: Кроме показателя {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}брони{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафа{/g} к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} тяжелая броня также имеет уникальный параметр — {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g}, который гарантированно снижает полученный {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} на указанное значение. Тяжелая броня хорошо защищает от урона, но уклоняться от атак в ней сложнее, чем в легкой и средней. Носить тяжелую броню могут только персонажи с {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}талантом{/g} Ношение тяжелой брони.
languages.original_text: In addition to the {g|Encyclopedia:Absorption}Armour{/g} and Dodge Penalty parameters, heavy armour also has a unique parameter — {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflection{/g}, which reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} received by the specified value. Heavy armour protects well from damage, but it is more difficult to dodge attacks in it than in light and medium armour. Only characters with the Heavy Armour Proficiency talent can wear heavy armour.

traits.locale_text:
Кроме показателя {g|Encyclopedia:Absorption}брони{/g} и штрафа к уклонению тяжелая броня также имеет уникальный параметр — {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g}, который гарантированно снижает полученный {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}урон{/g} на указанное значение. Тяжелая броня хорошо защищает от урона, но уклоняться от атак в ней сложнее, чем в легкой и средней.
Носить тяжелую броню могут только персонажи с талантом Ношение тяжелой брони.

Кроме показателя {g|Encyclopedia:Absorption}брони{/g} и штрафа к уклонению тяжелая броня также имеет уникальный параметр — {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g}, который гарантированно снижает полученный {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}урон{/g} на указанное значение. Тяжелая броня хорошо защищает от урона, но уклоняться от атак в ней сложнее, чем в легкой и средней.
Носить тяжелую броню могут только персонажи с талантом Ношение тяжелой брони.

languages.text:
In addition to the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} parameters, heavy armour also has a unique parameter — {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, which reduces {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} received by the specified value. Heavy armour protects well from damage but makes it more difficult to dodge attacks than light and {g|Encyclopedia:MediumArmour}medium armour{/g}.
Only characters with the {g|f:684c766dc9c24fcf856dc1d6f01d9290}Heavy Armour Proficiency{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} can wear heavy armour.
languages.original_text: Кроме показателя {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}брони{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафа{/g} к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} тяжелая броня также имеет уникальный параметр — {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g}, который гарантированно снижает полученный {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} на указанное значение. Тяжелая броня хорошо защищает от урона, но уклоняться от атак в ней сложнее, чем в легкой и средней. Носить тяжелую броню могут только персонажи с {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}талантом{/g} Ношение тяжелой брони.

traits.locale_text: In addition to the {g|Encyclopedia:Absorption}armour{/g} and dodge penalty parameters, heavy armour also has a unique parameter — {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, which reduces {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} received by the specified value. Heavy armour protects well from damage but makes it more difficult to dodge attacks than light and medium armour. Only characters with the Heavy Armour Proficiency talent can wear heavy armour.

In addition to the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} parameters, heavy armour also has a unique parameter — {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, which reduces {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} received by the specified value. Heavy armour protects well from damage but makes it more difficult to dodge attacks than light and {g|Encyclopedia:MediumArmour}medium armour{/g}. Only characters with the Heavy Armour Proficiency {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} can wear heavy armour.

In addition to the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} parameters, heavy armour also has a unique parameter — {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, which reduces {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} received by the specified value. Heavy armour protects well from damage but makes it more difficult to dodge attacks than light and {g|Encyclopedia:MediumArmour}medium armour{/g}. Only characters with the Heavy Armour Proficiency {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} can wear heavy armour.

languages.text:
Zusätzlich zu den Parametern {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweich{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} hat schwere Rüstung auch einen einzigartigen Parameter: {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g}, die den erlittenen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} um den angegebenen Wert reduziert. Schwere Rüstung schützt gut vor Schaden, macht es aber schwieriger, Angriffen auszuweichen als leichte und {g|Encyclopedia:MediumArmour}mittlere Rüstung{/g}.
Nur Charaktere mit dem {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talent{/g} {g|f:684c766dc9c24fcf856dc1d6f01d9290}Schwere Rüstung-Fertigkeit{/g} können schwere Rüstungen tragen.
languages.original_text:
In addition to the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} parameters, heavy armour also has a unique parameter — {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, which reduces {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} received by the specified value. Heavy armour protects well from damage but makes it more difficult to dodge attacks than light and {g|Encyclopedia:MediumArmour}medium armour{/g}.
Only characters with the {g|f:684c766dc9c24fcf856dc1d6f01d9290}Heavy Armour Proficiency{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} can wear heavy armour.

traits.locale_text: Zusätzlich zu den Parametern {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweich-{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} hat {g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}schwere Rüstung{/g} auch einen einzigartigen Parameter – {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g}, die den erhaltenen {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}Schaden{/g} um den angegebenen Wert reduziert. Schwere Rüstung schützt gut vor Schaden, macht es aber schwieriger, Angriffen auszuweichen als leichte und {g|Encyclopedia:MediumArmour}mittlere Rüstung{/g}. Nur Charaktere mit dem {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talent{/g} Schwere Rüstung (Fertigkeit) können schwere Rüstungen tragen.

languages.text:
Outre les paramètres de {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g}, l'armure lourde possède un paramètre unique, la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g}, qui réduit les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} subis de la valeur spécifiée. L'armure lourde offre une excellente protection, mais les attaques sont plus difficiles à esquiver qu'avec une {g|Encyclopedia:MediumArmour}armure légère ou moyenne{/g}.
Seuls les personnages dotés du {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} {g|f:684c766dc9c24fcf856dc1d6f01d9290}Maîtrise des armures lourdes{/g} peuvent en porter une.
languages.original_text:
In addition to the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} parameters, heavy armour also has a unique parameter — {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, which reduces {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} received by the specified value. Heavy armour protects well from damage but makes it more difficult to dodge attacks than light and {g|Encyclopedia:MediumArmour}medium armour{/g}.
Only characters with the {g|f:684c766dc9c24fcf856dc1d6f01d9290}Heavy Armour Proficiency{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} can wear heavy armour.

traits.locale_text: Outre les paramètres de {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g}, l'{g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}armure lourde{/g} possède un paramètre unique, la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g}, qui réduit les {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}dégâts{/g} subis de la valeur spécifiée. L'armure lourde offre une excellente protection mais les attaques sont plus difficiles à esquiver qu'avec une {g|Encyclopedia:MediumArmour}armure légère ou moyenne{/g}. Seuls les personnages dotés du {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} Maîtrise des Armures Lourdes peuvent porter une armure lourde.

languages.text:
除了{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}这两种属性之外，重型护甲还有着独特的属性——{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，可以将承受的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}降低固定值。重型护甲可以更好地防御伤害，但与轻型护甲与{g|Encyclopedia:MediumArmour}中型护甲{/g}相比，装备重型护甲的角色更难闪避敌方攻击。
只有拥有{g|f:684c766dc9c24fcf856dc1d6f01d9290}重甲专精{/g}这一{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}的角色，才能穿戴重型护甲。
languages.original_text:
In addition to the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} parameters, heavy armour also has a unique parameter — {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, which reduces {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} received by the specified value. Heavy armour protects well from damage but makes it more difficult to dodge attacks than light and {g|Encyclopedia:MediumArmour}medium armour{/g}.
Only characters with the {g|f:684c766dc9c24fcf856dc1d6f01d9290}Heavy Armour Proficiency{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} can wear heavy armour.

traits.locale_text: 除了{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}这两种属性之外，{g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}重型护甲{/g}还有着独特的属性——{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，可以将承受的{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}降低固定值。重型护甲可以更好地防御伤害，但与轻型护甲与{g|Encyclopedia:MediumArmour}中型护甲{/g}相比，装备重型护甲的角色更难闪避敌方攻击。 只有拥有重甲专精这一{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}的角色，才能穿戴重型护甲。

languages.original_text: In addition to the {g|Encyclopedia:Absorption}armour{/g} and dodge penalty parameters, heavy armour also has a unique parameter — {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, which reduces {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} received by the specified value. Heavy armour protects well from damage but makes it more difficult to dodge attacks than light and medium armour. Only characters with the Heavy Armour Proficiency talent can wear heavy armour.

languages.text:
Además de los parámetros de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g}, la armadura pesada tiene un parámetro único: el {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g}, que reduce el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} recibido en la cantidad especificada. La armadura pesada ofrece buena protección contra el daño, pero dificulta más esquivar ataques que la {g|Encyclopedia:MediumArmour}armadura media{/g} y ligera.
Solo los personajes con el {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talento{/g} {g|f:684c766dc9c24fcf856dc1d6f01d9290}Competencia con armadura pesada{/g} pueden utilizarla.
languages.original_text:
In addition to the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} parameters, heavy armour also has a unique parameter — {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, which reduces {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} received by the specified value. Heavy armour protects well from damage but makes it more difficult to dodge attacks than light and {g|Encyclopedia:MediumArmour}medium armour{/g}.
Only characters with the {g|f:684c766dc9c24fcf856dc1d6f01d9290}Heavy Armour Proficiency{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} can wear heavy armour.

traits.locale_text: Además de los parámetros de {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}armadura pesada{/g} tiene un parámetro único: el {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g}, que reduce el {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}daño{/g} recibido en la cantidad especificada. La armadura pesada ofrece buena protección contra el daño, pero dificulta más esquivar ataques que la {g|Encyclopedia:MediumArmour}armadura media{/g} y ligera. Solo los personajes con el {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talento{/g} Competencia con armadura pesada pueden utilizarla.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}パラメータに加え、ヘビーアーマーにも独自のパラメータである{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}がある。このパラメータは特定の数値により受けた{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を軽減する。ヘビーアーマーはダメージをしっかりと防ぐが、攻撃回避がライトアーマーや{g|Encyclopedia:MediumArmour}ミディアムアーマー{/g}より難しくなる。 ヘビーアーマーの達人の{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}能力{/g}を持つキャラクターのみが、ヘビーアーマーを着用できる。
languages.original_text: In addition to the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} parameters, heavy armour also has a unique parameter — {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, which reduces {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} received by the specified value. Heavy armour protects well from damage but makes it more difficult to dodge attacks than light and {g|Encyclopedia:MediumArmour}medium armour{/g}. Only characters with the Heavy Armour Proficiency {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} can wear heavy armour.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}パラメータに加え、{g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}ヘビーアーマー{/g}にも独自のパラメータである{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}がある。このパラメータは特定の数値により受けた{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}ダメージ{/g}を軽減する。ヘビーアーマーはダメージをしっかりと防ぐが、攻撃回避がライトアーマーや{g|Encyclopedia:MediumArmour}ミディアムアーマー{/g}より難しくなる。 ヘビーアーマーの達人の{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}能力{/g}を持つキャラクターのみが、ヘビーアーマーを着用できる。

languages.text:
Ağır zırhın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanı{/g} parametrelerine ek olarak kendine özgü bir parametresi bulunur. {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Saptırma{/g} adı verilen bu parametre, alınacak {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarı{/g} belirli miktarda azaltır. Ağır zırh, hasara karşı iyi koruma sağlasa da hafif ve {g|Encyclopedia:MediumArmour}orta düzey zırhlara{/g} kıyasla saldırılardan kaçınmayı çok daha zorlaştırır.
Yalnızca {g|f:684c766dc9c24fcf856dc1d6f01d9290}Ağır Zırh Yetkinliği{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}becerisine{/g} sahip karakterler ağır zırh giyebilir.
languages.original_text:
In addition to the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} parameters, heavy armour also has a unique parameter — {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, which reduces {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} received by the specified value. Heavy armour protects well from damage but makes it more difficult to dodge attacks than light and {g|Encyclopedia:MediumArmour}medium armour{/g}.
Only characters with the {g|f:684c766dc9c24fcf856dc1d6f01d9290}Heavy Armour Proficiency{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} can wear heavy armour.
